site.title: National Enterprise & Development Chamber (NEDC)
site.tagline: Shaping the next Tanzania — no dream wasted

header.title: National Enterprise & Development Chamber (NEDC)
header.subtitle: A platform where entrepreneurs access finance, skills, markets and mentorship.
header.source: Foreword / Founder & Executive Director (Jesse Stephen Madauda). :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

about.vision: A Tanzania where every entrepreneur has the opportunity, resources, and support to build enterprises that create jobs, drive innovation, and contribute to a sustainable and inclusive national economy.
about.mission: Close the gap between the haves and have-nots; strengthen SMEs and startups through access to finance, markets, skills and technology; promote green and blue economy; champion gender equality and youth empowerment.

leadership.name: Jesse Stephen Madauda
leadership.title: Founder & Executive Director
leadership.bio: Founder & Executive Director — authored the foreword and leads the Executive Secretariat.

leadership.name: Benedict Ishabakaki
leadership.title: Chairperson of the Board
leadership.bio: Chairman of the Board. Provides governance oversight and public confidence.
leadership.source: Message from the Chairman of the Board. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

programs.title: BongoFursa Televised Pitch Show
programs.summary: National TV pitch show connecting entrepreneurs with investors and mentors. (Target: 1,000 entrepreneurs pitched; 150+ funded in three years).

programs.title: BongoFursa App (Digital Platform)
programs.summary: Mobile & web app connecting entrepreneurs to finance, mentors, jobs and markets. Target: 100,000 active users by 2028.

programs.title: NEDC Innovation Hub
programs.summary: Physical & virtual incubation space for startups and SMEs (target: support 500 startups).

programs.title: From Idea to Business (Training)
programs.summary: Practical training program to turn ideas into viable businesses (20,000 youth trained in 3 years).

programs.title: NEDC Youth Insurance
programs.summary: Insurance product to protect youth entrepreneurs from shocks (target: 50,000 youth insured).

programs.title: National Innovation Awards
programs.summary: Annual awards that recognize top entrepreneurs and connect winners to investors and media.

programs.title: Business Literacy for Youth (BLY) Syllabus
programs.summary: Entrepreneurship curriculum rolled out in colleges and vocational centers (target: 50 institutions & 30,000 students).

contact.headquarters: National Enterprise and Development Chamber (NEDC), Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
